title: [MVP] Hero Page with CTA and Onboarding
body: Create the hero section with title, subheadline, 3-step explainer, and call-to-action button to start building a cap table. Ensure responsiveness.

title: [MVP] Team Member Input Form
body: Build input fields to add founder/team member names and share counts. Include an 'Add Founder' button and manage entries in React state.

title: [MVP] SAFE Investor Input
body: Add optional SAFE investor input fields (name, amount, valuation cap). Validate and store the data in local state.

title: [MVP] Cap Table Display + Recharts Pie Chart
body: Display cap table entries in a table view with name, shares, and ownership %. Add a dynamic pie chart using Recharts that updates as data changes.

title: [MVP] Inject Cap Table JSON into AI Copilot
body: Create an input box for questions. Inject the current cap table state and question into Claude/OpenAI with a friendly ELI5 system prompt. Show markdown-style response.

title: [MVP] Tooltip Definitions for Finance Terms
body: Implement inline tooltips for key finance terms like SAFE, dilution, valuation cap, and shares using <span title='...'> format or reusable component.

title: [MVP] Learn Mode Sidebar with Explanations
body: Create a sticky or collapsible sidebar to show friendly explanations and reinforce user learning. Reacts to key input changes.

title: [MVP] Sample Scenario Loader + Clear Button
body: Add utility buttons to load a sample scenario (Nova founder + SAFE) and clear the current cap table state.
